discoverBlogEntriesData.title: Fitness Tips for Busy Professionals: How to Stay Active During Business Trips and Corporate Retreats

main.description:
Balancing work, family, and other commitments can make staying fit a challenge—but with the right approach, you can achieve your goals without compromising your busy lifestyle. Whether you're aiming to lose weight, build muscle, or maintain a healthy routine, this guide offers the best tips for staying on track.

 

Defining Fitness Goals

 

Setting clear and realistic goals is essential for success. Start by identifying your main goal—whether it’s shedding a few pounds, building muscle, enhancing your endurance, or maintaining overall wellness. Knowing what you want to achieve will help tailor a structured workout schedule that meets your specific needs. Breaking down large goals into manageable steps can also help maintain focus and motivation. If your aim is to run a 10K, start with running a mile and gradually increase your distance each week.

 

Evaluating Your Lifestyle Needs

 

Finding time for fitness is often the biggest challenge for those with demanding schedules, but small adjustments can make a big difference. Assess your daily routine and identify moments that can be dedicated to exercise—even 20 to 30 minutes of daily physical activity can be impactful. You can also opt for convenient workouts like quick HIIT sessions or short gym visits. Schedule your sessions like any other appointment to build consistency, and add movement throughout your day by taking the stairs, walking during calls, or stretching during breaks.

 

Maximizing Your Gym Experience

 

In a world where time is precious, your gym sessions must be both efficient and impactful. Choose a facility that is close to your office or meeting space, making it easier to stick to your schedule. Arrive with a well-planned routine, prioritizing exercises such as squats and deadlifts that target multiple muscle groups. Despite a tight schedule, always include warm-ups and cool-downs to prepare your body and aid recovery, helping you maintain peak performance.

 

Prioritizing Health and Wellness

 

 

True fitness extends beyond the gym; it’s about embracing a holistic approach to health and wellness. Focus on consuming wholefood, lean proteins, healthy fats, and plenty of fresh fruits and vegetables to nourish your body from the inside out. Staying hydrated is equally important, with at least eight cups of water daily recommended, especially if you engage in high intensity exercise. You can also manage stress through mindful practices like yoga or meditation, cultivating inner calm amidst your demanding schedule.

Your journey doesn’t have to take a backseat to your busy lifestyle. By embracing this guide, you can elevate your health and well-being, no matter how hectic your schedule gets. As you continue to make small changes, you’ll find that maintaining an active routine becomes a natural extension of who you are. Start today and let these tips transform your approach to fitness.

discoverBlogEntriesData.title: Travel Tips for the Rainy Season: From Luxury Accommodations to Hotel Activities

main.description:
The Philippines, with its stunning landscapes and rich cultural heritage, remains a captivating destination year-round. However, traveling during the rainy season, typically from June to November, presents unique challenges and opportunities. Here’s everything you need to know to make the most of your trip.

 

Packing essentials for wet weather

 

When traveling in the rainy season, packing the right essentials can make all the difference in your comfort and enjoyment. Here are some must-haves for your trip:

 

Waterproof Gear: Invest in high-quality waterproof gear, including a durable jacket, rain shoes, and a sturdy umbrella. These items will keep you dry and comfortable as you explore. A waterproof bag is also essential to protect your belongings.

Insect Repellent: Rainy weather can bring out mosquitoes and other insects. Consider bringing repellent or natural alternatives like citronella oil to protect yourself from bites.

Portable Charger: Packing a portable charger is essential for any trip, especially during the rainy season when power outages and limited charging opportunities are more likely. Some models include built-in flashlights and additional features which can save space in your luggage.

 

Choosing the right destination

Selecting the perfect destination for your rainy season travel is crucial. Some places are more enjoyable during wet weather than others. Here are a few tips for choosing the right destination:

 

Research Rainfall Patterns: Look for destinations with moderate rainfall and fewer chances of severe storms. Some tropical destinations have short, intense showers that quickly clear up, making them ideal for a rainy season visit.

City Escapes: Urban destinations often have plenty of indoor activities, museums, and cultural sites to explore, making them great choices for rainy days. Districts like Makati and Ortigas offer a plethora of indoor attractions that can keep you entertained regardless of the weather.

Scenic Beauty: Consider the unique charm of Siargao, where the rain enhances the island's lush scenery and creates ideal surfing conditions. On the other hand, Baguio’s cool climate becomes even more refreshing during the rainy season.

 

Indoor activities to keep you entertained

Rainy days don’t have to be boring. Many destinations offer a variety of indoor activities to keep you entertained throughout your stay:

 

Museums and Art Galleries: Spend a day exploring local museums and art galleries to soak in the culture and history of your destination. In Makati, the Ayala and Yuchengco Museums offer rich and immersive experiences for all visitors.

Shopping: Visit local markets and boutiques to discover unique souvenirs and enjoy some retail therapy. Indoor malls like Glorietta and The Podium offer vibrant shopping experiences sheltered from the rain.

Spa Treatments: Treat yourself to a relaxing spa day. Many luxury hotels and resorts offer spa services that can help you unwind and recharge. Enjoy massages, facials, and other treatments designed to rejuvenate your body and mind.

 

Savoring comfort food and cozy meals

Rainy weather is perfect for indulging in comfort food and cozy meals. Here are some ideas to warm your heart and satisfy your taste buds:

 

Local Cuisine: Explore the local cuisine and try hearty soups, stews, and other comfort foods that are popular in the region. Enjoy a steaming bowl of bulalo or arroz caldo, which are sure to warm you up.

Cafes and Bakeries: The soft pattern of raindrops against the window creates a serene atmosphere, perfect for indulging in the comforting flavors of freshly baked treats. Whether you're sharing pastries with friends or enjoying a quiet moment to yourself, a cozy lounge offers a warm respite from the rain.

Hot Beverages: Warm up with hot beverages like coffee or tea. Seek out unique local variations such as hot tsokolate, a traditional Filipino hot chocolate made from pure cacao tablets and melted into a rich, thick drink.

 

Making the most of rainy days

Even when the weather doesn’t cooperate, there are plenty of ways to make the most of your rainy days:

 

Relax and Unwind: Imagine staying at a hotel and sinking into a bed adorned with plush sheets. The room is perfectly chilled, set to just the right temperature to ensure a restful sleep. Everything is within reach, and for those moments when you crave something extra, a simple call to room service is all it takes to bring you what you need.

Indoor Workouts: Stay active even when it’s raining by engaging in indoor workouts. Many hotels in the city have fitness centers, or you can try yoga, Pilates, or other exercises in your room. Keeping up with your fitness routine will help you feel energized and healthy during your travels.

Plan Future Travels: Spend some time researching and planning your next adventure. Look up destinations, create itineraries, and dream about future trips. Use the downtime to gather inspiration and excitement for your next journey.

 

Traveling in the Philippines during the rainy season offers a unique and captivating experience. While the weather may be unpredictable, with a bit of preparation and flexibility, you can still enjoy the stunning landscapes, rich culture, and warm hospitality that the country is known for. 

 

Remember to pack all the right essentials, plan your itinerary with weather conditions in mind, and always prioritize safety. Whether you’re navigating the city streets or exploring the crystal-clear waters of its beautiful islands, the Philippines has endless adventures waiting for you.

discoverBlogEntriesData.title: City Wedding or Destination Wedding: The best place to exchange your ‘I dos’

main.description:
When it comes to planning your dream wedding, decision-making plays an essential role. One of the most significant aspects is choosing your perfect location. Whether it’s an elegant city wedding or a picturesque destination wedding you’re dreaming of, it will set the tone for your entire celebration. 

Come along as we explore the unique charms and crucial considerations of both city and destination weddings. By the end of this blog, we hope this can help you narrow down your options in choosing your ideal setting for your special day.

 

All About City Weddings: Pros and What to consider


A couple’s photo shoot at Discovery Primea in Makati City

Pros

A perfect blend of glamour and convenience—ideal for couples seeking a cosmopolitan celebration. City weddings often transpire in iconic venues offering breathtaking cityscape views while providing a picturesque backdrop for photos. Its accessibility to city amenities simplifies logistics for couples and guests alike, providing a wide range of accommodation, dining, and entertainment options.

What to consider

Although it does not require long hours of travel, navigating city traffic and parking spaces can pose challenges, as costs may be more expensive due to venue fees and city-specific expenses. Additionally, if you are envisioning a tranquil atomosphere surrounded by nature’s beauty, you might find the city’s bustling environment and limited green spaces less ideal for the scenic backdrop you have in mind.

 

All About Destination Weddings: Pros and What to consider


An intimate rustic wedding set-up at Discovery Coron (known as Club Paradise Palawan)

Pros

A picturesque locale far from home, destination weddings bring an exotic and intimate atmosphere for couples looking to tie the knot. Its allure lies in its ability to perfectly mesh the ceremony and honeymoon into an unforgettable, seamless experience. This includes breathtaking settings such as tropical beaches and rustic countryside. Celebrations are more festive, and destination weddings are known to host multiple-day celebrations. This also benefits your guests, as they get to have a mini-vacation, making your special day even more memorable for everyone involved. 


What to consider

Its planning can be more complex, which often requires the assistance of a local wedding planner. Depending on your budget, there may be a travel expense constraint for some guests, which can potentially limit attendance to your closest friends and family.

 

Which is the better choice?


A picturesque wedding photo shoot at Discovery Boracay

When it comes to making the “better choice," this all boils down to consideration of certain factors and your personal preferences as a couple. This usually entails your budget and the experience for you and your guests. 

Consider answering these questions to help you weigh your options accordingly:

Preferred Setting: Are you looking for a posh urban backdrop or a serene and scenic destination? 
Budget: What would best fit your overall budget?
Logistics: Do you prefer the convenience of planning a wedding in the city or are you up for the complexities of planning a destination wedding?
Guest List: Do you want it to be a grand celebration with a large number of guests, or do you want a more intimate celebration?
Experience: What experience do you want to create for yourself and your guests? A chic celebration in the midst of the city’s pulsating energy or a dreamy getaway in a faraway destination?

Both city and destination weddings possess a unique charm of their own. At the end of the day, the better choice is the one that will align with your personal preferences—vision, priorities, and circumstances. 

Celebrate your wedding with Discovery hotels and resorts


A beach wedding getaway at Discovery Samal, a five-minute boat ride from Davao City

Located in the Philippines’ most iconic city and beach destinations, where every moment is designed to be unforgettable, celebrate your wedding with Discovery hotels and resorts.


Customized table arrangement at Discovery Suites in Ortigas Center, Pasig City

Contemporary yet classic, simple yet sophisticated. Beyond the breathtaking views, highly personalized services are available at Discovery Primea and Discovery Suites, ready to give you that seamless city wedding experience you’re envisioning.


Beach wedding at Discovery Coron

Easy, breezy, fun, and memorable—this is how beach weddings are meant to be. Exchange your sun-kissed I Do’s at Discovery Resorts’ stunning beach destinations in Boracay, Coron, and Samal Island in Davao. Looking to add a flair of unique touches to your celebration? Take your wedding celebration to a distinct sanctuary surrounded by nature’s beauty in Sipalay, Negros Occidental—Manami Resort.


Couple captured with the sunset at Manami Resort in Sipalay, Negros Occidental (Photo by HAYAG Studios)

No matter where you dream of saying ‘I do’, Discovery hotels and resorts offer a variety of locations to be the perfect setting for your unforgettable celebration.

A picturesque locale far from home, destination weddings bring an exotic and intimate atmosphere for couples looking to tie the knot. Its allure lies in its ability to perfectly mesh the ceremony and honeymoon into an unforgettable, seamless experience. This includes breathtaking settings such as tropical beaches and rustic countryside. Celebrations are more festive, and destination weddings are known to host multiple-day celebrations. This also benefits your guests, as they get to have a mini-vacation, making your special day even more memorable for everyone involved. 


What to consider

Its planning can be more complex, which often requires the assistance of a local wedding planner. Depending on your budget, there may be a travel expense constraint for some guests, which can potentially limit attendance to your closest friends and family.

 

Which is the better choice?


A picturesque wedding photo shoot at Discovery Boracay

When it comes to making the “better choice," this all boils down to consideration of certain factors and your personal preferences as a couple. This usually entails your budget and the experience for you and your guests. 

Consider answering these questions to help you weigh your options accordingly:

Preferred Setting: Are you looking for a posh urban backdrop or a serene and scenic destination? 
Budget: What would best fit your overall budget?
Logistics: Do you prefer the convenience of planning a wedding in the city or are you up for the complexities of planning a destination wedding?
Guest List: Do you want it to be a grand celebration with a large number of guests, or do you want a more intimate celebration?
Experience: What experience do you want to create for yourself and your guests? A chic celebration in the midst of the city’s pulsating energy or a dreamy getaway in a faraway destination?

Both city and destination weddings possess a unique charm of their own. At the end of the day, the better choice is the one that will align with your personal preferences—vision, priorities, and circumstances. 

Celebrate your wedding with Discovery hotels and resorts


A beach wedding getaway at Discovery Samal, a five-minute boat ride from Davao City

Located in the Philippines’ most iconic city and beach destinations, where every moment is designed to be unforgettable, celebrate your wedding with Discovery hotels and resorts.


Customized table arrangement at Discovery Suites in Ortigas Center, Pasig City

Contemporary yet classic, simple yet sophisticated. Beyond the breathtaking views, highly personalized services are available at Discovery Primea and Discovery Suites, ready to give you that seamless city wedding experience you’re envisioning.


Beach wedding at Discovery Coron

Easy, breezy, fun, and memorable—this is how beach weddings are meant to be. Exchange your sun-kissed I Do’s at Discovery Resorts’ stunning beach destinations in Boracay, Coron, and Samal Island in Davao. Looking to add a flair of unique touches to your celebration? Take your wedding celebration to a distinct sanctuary surrounded by nature’s beauty in Sipalay, Negros Occidental—Manami Resort.


Couple captured with the sunset at Manami Resort in Sipalay, Negros Occidental (Photo by HAYAG Studios)

No matter where you dream of saying ‘I do’, Discovery hotels and resorts offer a variety of locations to be the perfect setting for your unforgettable celebration.

discoverBlogEntriesData.title: Summer Days in the City: The Benefits of a City Staycation

main.description:
With the rise in temperature and the cityscape brimming with vibrant energy, there is something uniquely enticing about spending the summer days in the heart of the urban jungle. While jetting off to faraway destinations seems like the norm for a summer getaway, city staycations have their own special charm that can add a unique touch to your summer memories.

The convenience of familiar surroundings brings hidden gems waiting to be discovered. Get ready to see your city in a whole new light as we uncover the perks of a summer staycation in this bustling metropolis. 


Time-efficient and convenient


A walkway along Ayala Avenue seamlessly connecting establishments in the area

Without the hassle of long-distance travel, summer city staycations offer the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure. You can explore local attractions, dine at the hottest restaurants in town, or enjoy your hotel amenities. A city staycation lets you recharge without the stress of packing and long journeys.  Why not embrace the energetic pulse of the city?


Discover hidden local gems


An aerial view of Makati City at night

Sometimes, the greatest discoveries are closer than we think; all it takes is a little bit of exploration. An escape in the city lets you dive into its distinctive charm—from the lively streets to the quiet corners where creativity flourishes and every day brings a new adventure!

Take Makati City, for instance. Known for its rich, dynamic lifestyle, Makati offers a diverse range of delights that will make you feel like a local. Uncover unique cafes, restaurants, and bars in quaint neighborhoods, like Poblacion, Legaspi, and Salcedo Villages. Looking to connect with nature while taking a breather? Wander through the leafy pathways of Ayala Triangle Park or enrich your knowledge of Filipino culture at the Ayala Museum.


The perfect balance of exploration and relaxation


Emerald Avenue in Ortigas Center

Imagine starting your day with a leisurely stroll along the bustling streets of Ortigas Center, lined with modern skyscrapers and bustling with activity. Take delight in the morning buzz as you walk along Emerald Avenue (also known as F. Ortigas Jr. Road). Whether you're in the mood for a hearty breakfast from a fast-food favorite or a smooth latte from a nearby coffee shop, this lively stretch has everything you need to kickstart your day. Along the way, you can look forward to a brief change of scenery when you stop by Ortigas Park, where a touch of nature will keep you company, whether you are winding down after a morning jog or you simply want to take a pause from the daily grind.

Looking to shop the latest trends or maybe catch the latest movie playing with your loved ones? Large malls in the area, such as The Podium and Shangri-La Plaza, provide for all your daily and recreational needs. After an activity-filled day, a cozy hotel like Discovery Suites can provide you the perfect place to relax and recharge before embarking on your next city adventure.


Explore the local metropolitan charm with Discovery Primea and Discovery Suites

Located in the heart of thriving urban landscapes, Discovery Primea and Discovery Suites bring you the magic of metropolitan charm with unforgettable city stays. Whether you’re in town for business or leisure, both of these premier accommodations provide an oasis of comfort amidst the city’s dynamic energy, offering easy access to top attractions, dining, and shopping destinations.


Rooftop infinity pool at Discovery Primea, Makati

World-class amenities and breathtaking city views in Makati await you at Discovery Primea, where elegantly appointed suite rooms offer a serene escape from the hustle and bustle. Meanwhile, Discovery Suites provides a homey yet deluxe atmosphere in the heart of the Ortigas Center Business District. The spacious suites are ideal for both short and extended stays and are designed to cater to every traveler’s needs.


A guest during a staycation at Discovery Suites, Manila

Learn more about Discovery Primea at www.discoveryprimea.com and Discovery Suites at www.discoverysuites.com
